name: Raging Flame
description:
This is a Turn-based Top Down shooter that I created for GameJam "Mini Jam 4th Edition" )https://itch.io/jam/mini-jam-4th-edition). Theme: Flame.

You are a flame from the Fire Kingdom and can't stand  the tyranny of the Water Empire. Be a hero, put and end to tyranny!!!

There are 9 level total. Are you the hero that the Fire Kingdom needs?
